description: This file contains Django REST Framework views for a product management API, including endpoints for health check, listing/creating products, retrieving/updating/deleting individual products, and calculating total inventory balance.

classes.name: DefaultPageNumberPagination
classes.description: Custom pagination class with default page size and maximum page size.

classes.name: ProductListCreateView
classes.description: API view for listing and creating products, with pagination.

classes.name: ProductRetrieveUpdateDestroyView
classes.description: API view for retrieving, updating, or deleting a specific product by ID.

methods.name: health
methods.description: A simple health check endpoint returning server status.

methods.name: total_inventory_balance
methods.description: Calculates and returns the total inventory value by summing price * quantity for all products.
